alert.note: Alert for Lancaster; Mathews; Middlesex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 3:31AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN MIDDLESEX... NORTHERN MATHEWS AND SOUTHEASTERN LANCASTER COUNTIES THROUGH 415 AM EDT... At 330 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hartfield, or near Deltaville, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Deltaville around 335 AM EDT. White Stone around 345 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Weems, Cobbs Creek, Wilton, Grafton, Amburg, Stampers, Wake, Foxwells, Hardyville, and Christ Church. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
